name: Davos
short_description: Web-based download manager with queue, scheduling, and FTP/SFTP support.
description: Davos is a web-based FTP/SFTP download manager that allows you to manage downloads from remote servers. Features include FTP/SFTP support, download queue, scheduling, automatic retry, folder watching, and a clean web interface. Perfect for downloading large files or managing bulk downloads from remote servers.
